metamask.description: To view LikeCoin on your Metamask, you need to add the {chainName} ({chainId}) to your Metamask.

introduction.text: LikeCoin has upgraded to v3 and migrated to Ethereum Base Chain. Please upgrade your v2 LikeCoin, BookNFTs, and Writing NFTs as soon as possible to avoid being left behind.
introduction.title: Introduction

wallet-connect-error.pool-balance-insufficient: Sorry, we don't have sufficient balance to complete your request. Please contact support.
